If I could give half stars this would be 3.5.  The atmosphere was really nice but the food lacked flavor.  We had a good conversation with some other people dining would had been in Barcelona a week and also mentioned the meal wasn't the best they'd had.  It's decent enough with good drink...Maybe we just ordered the wrong stuff: papas bravas (best thing we ordered), Argentinan steak skewer, sea bass, calamari, ice cream with popcorn (also pretty great).   Just expected more based on the reviews!
